BWGS 0.1.0

BWGS (BreedWheat Genomic Selection pipeline)

The R package BWGS is developed by Gilles Charmet gilles.charmet@inra.fr. This repository is forked from original repository and modified as a R package.

Installation

Install from CRAN

install.packages("BWGS")

Install dev version from github Github only.

devtools::install_github('byzheng/BWGS')

Documentation

See reference from here. See full documentation from original repository and publication.
